description: This file defines React components for a UI component explorer, specifically a toggle between 'Preview' and 'Code' views, and tabs for displaying HTML and JavaScript code with proper accessibility features.

methods.name: TabToggle({ value, onChange, idBase = 'preview-code' })
methods.description: A React component that provides an accessible toggle for switching between 'Preview' and 'Code' views.

methods.name: CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' })
methods.description: A React component that provides accessible tabs for switching between HTML and JS code blocks, each with its own render panel.

ctags.name: CodeTabs
ctags.pattern: /^export function CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' }) {$/
